name: MIS Ethnic Monitoring Education Report
description:
Counts the number of prisoners who attended an educational activity within a specified time period and splits the counts by percentage values; it is grouped by Establishment Area, Establishment Code, Educational Activity and Ethnicity.
ACT0003 - v00.01.01 Last Modified: 03/09/12

dataset.name: Ethnic Education
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.AREA_DESCRIPTION, AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE='MERGE' Then 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE IS NULL Then 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE='W8' then 'W3' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE='O1' then 'A4' ELSE AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE END , COUNT(distinct(AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY)) FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES, BODIMIS.DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE WHERE ( AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE(+)=AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ETHNICITY_CODE ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID=CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /*= #Variable('BOUSER') */ )) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= to_char(sysdate,'YYYY')-6 ) ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK=AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK ) AND ( AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK=AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK ) AND ( AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK=AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.ESTABLISHMENT_SK ) AND ( AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE.PROGRAMME_SERVICE_SK=AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.PROGRAMME_SERVICE_SK ) AND ( ( AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK in (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /*= #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Activities\Activity Establishment Code',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:70) */ ) Or 'All' in (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /*= #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Activities\Activity Establishment Code',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:70) */ ) ) AND ( AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.AREA_DESCRIPTION in (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /*= #Prompt('Establishment Area (All for all)','A','Hidden Objects\Activity Establishment Area',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:68) */ ) Or 'All' in (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /*= #Prompt('Establishment Area (All for all)','A','Hidden Objects\Activity Establishment Area',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:68) */ ) ) AND AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE.DESCRIPTION IN ( 'Education Leading to Accreditation','Other Education Activities' ) AND ( AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.START_TIME >= (SELECT START_DATE FROM prompt_ /*= #Prompt('Enter Begin Date (DD/MM/YYYY):','D',,mono,free,Not_Persistent,User:3) */ ) and AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.START_TIME < to_date((SELECT END_DATE FROM prompt_ /*= #Prompt('Enter End Date (DD/MM/YYYY):','D',,mono,free,Not_Persistent,User:4) */ )) + 1 ) AND ( AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.ALLOCATED_FLAG = 'Y' ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND='Y' ) ) GROUP BY AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.AREA_DESCRIPTION, AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE='MERGE' Then 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE IS NULL Then 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE='W8' then 'W3' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE='O1' then 'A4' ELSE AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE END), dataset_ AS (SELECT FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Ethnic Code
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT CASE WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'MERGE' THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE IS NULL THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'W8' THEN 'W3' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'O1' THEN 'A4' ELSE AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE END AS PHYSICAL_DETAILS_ETHNIC_CODE, CASE WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'MERGE' THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE IS NULL THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'W8' THEN 'White: Gypsy or Irish Traveller' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'O1' THEN 'Asian/Asian British: Chinese' ELSE AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.DESCRIPTION END AS ETHNIC_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES), dataset_ AS (SELECT PHYSICAL_DETAILS_ETHNIC_CODE, ETHNIC_DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Data Load Date
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE ETHNIC_DESCRIPTION NOT(IN ('Unknown','Not Valid','Not Applicable')))
